text: Commerce started as a result of _______
explanation: Commerce which primarily involves the exchange of goods and services among people started as the need for the distribution of these goods and services arose.

text: The process of changing raw materials into finished goods is ________
explanation: Manufacturing is simply the process of turning raw materials into finished goods through the use of both human labor and material labour.

text: An example of a primary product is _____
explanation:
Primary products consist of natural raw materials and unmanufactured products used in the productive process.
From the option above, cocoa is a primary product as it is used in the manufacturing of beverages and other consumer products.

text: All activities geared towards the distribution and exchange of goods and services is _______
explanation: Commerce has to do with activities involving the exchange of goods and services between parties along with the activities such as insurance, transportation, warehousing, advertising, etc that complete that exchange.

text: The word ''limited"  written after the name of a company means that

options.A: it has a democratic system of management
options.B: members are liable to the extent of their shareholdings only
options.C: the company is a going concern

explanation:
This means that in the event that the company folds up and its assets are liquidated, the liabilities of the company are only limited to the invested amount or the assets of the company.
Simply put, if a company folds up, the private properties or assets of the owners of the company cannot be used to settle investors (debts). Only business assets can be used to settle the legal obligations of the company to shareholders or investors as the case may be.

text: Which type of occupation is a carpenter engaged in?
explanation: Construction occupation means all job classifications associated with construction. A carpenter falls under this class of occupation as their jobs involve the art and trade of cutting, working, and joining timber/wood.

explanation: A public company is a corporation whose ownership is distributed amongst general public shareholders through publicly-traded stock shares. This means this kind of business enterprise can raise capital through the issue of shares in the stock exchange market

explanation: When selling on credit, there is always a very high possibility that some of your creditors will not pay up as at when due or may fail to pay at all. text: What is the average stock?
explanation:
Average stock = \(\frac{\text {opening stock + closing stock}}{2}\)
\(\frac{4000+12000}{2}\)
= 8000

text: The cost of goods sold is
explanation:
COGS = Opening Stock + Purchases − Closing Stock
Substituting the values provided Opening Stock = 4000, Purchases = 17000, Closing Stock = 12000
COGS = 4000 + 17000 − 12000 = 9000
Therefore, the Cost of Goods Sold (COGS) is 9000

text: Which of the following means of payment requires acceptance by the debtor to make it valuable?
explanation: A bill of exchange is of real use if it is accepted by the person directed to pay the amount. For example, if Mr. X orders Mr. Y to pay N10,000 for 90 days after the date and Y accepts this order by signing his name, then it will be a bill of exchange.

text: The purpose for which the Central Bank sells securities is to
explanation:
The apex bank sells securities as a monetary policy tool. We all know that when there is excess money in circulation, it ultimately leads to inflation where plenty of money is used to purchase a few goods, thereby reducing the purchasing power of money.
When there is excess money in circulation in the economy, the central bank raises interest rates and sells securities to mop out the excess money.
When interest rates are raised, people will be discouraged from borrowing and would rather want to invest or save their money to earn high returns on investments.
Ultimately, the central bank sells securities to reduce the excess money in circulation in the economy.

text: The amount a current account holder is allowed to withdraw in excess of the balance in his account is _______
explanation:
An overdraft is a loan facility available to only current account holders, where a bank allows a customer to withdraw or take out more money than the account holder has in the account.
This means if a bank customer has only N10,000 in the bank account and needs, say N20,000 to meet financial obligations, they can request an overdraft which allows them to withdraw up to N20,000 with a promise of paying back on a specific day. This is very common among salary earners who have a stable means of income.
The money is then deducted directly from their next deposit depending on the terms of repayment, whether full or on installment.

text: The saying that the 'consumer is always right' describes the doctrine of
explanation: The ''customer is always right'' slogan means that the needs and desires of the customer are always paramount and this can be attributed to the principle of consumer sovereignty, which opines that the desires and needs of consumers control the output of producers.

text: A disadvantage of privatization is that

options.A: there is reduction in the quality of goods
options.B: there is incipiency in the supply of goods
options.C: the existence of monopoly is high
options.D: the profit motive outweighs public interest

explanation:
Privatization as we all know is the transfer of the ownership of a public enterprise to private individuals or the private sector for the sole purpose of profit maximization.
This profit-driven motive is disadvantageous in the way that, the establishment or enterprises ends up placing their need to make a profit above service delivery which is the core motive of public enterprise.
